titleStmt.title: The Christians testimony against tythes in an account of the great spoil and rapine committed by the Bishop of Chester's tythe-farmer at Cartmell in Lancashire upon the people there called Quakers in the years 1677 and 1678 : acting first as an informer upon the Act against Conventicles for which his witnesses stand indicted for perjury, secondly by suits in inferiour courts (for tythes) contrary to law.
titleStmt.author: Atkinson, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: "Published to the world by Thomas Atkinson."--colophon.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
